summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 185 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 903 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 185.4m lower than yesterday, 26.5m lower than the past week, 902.9m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 745m to 3580m and averaged 1801.0m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Periods of rain anticipated, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and sunlight will be very intense and bright. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
